Class AcceptableUsagePolicyFormAction

  • java.lang.Object

    @Component(value="acceptableUsagePolicyFormAction")
public class AcceptableUsagePolicyFormAction
extends org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
    Webflow action to receive and record the AUP response.

        Verify whether the policy is accepted.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        credential - the credential
        messageContext - the message context
        Returns:
        success if policy is accepted. EVENT_ID_MUST_ACCEPT otherwise.
